The idea is excellent... typically in this day and age it's a "meh". While it looks nice and plays ok it has some glaring issues.
I though the murderer was gunna be a mix and match of murderers and monster... really they are just the same guy with a slight skin change and a single diffrent defining skill and perk. 

First off there's barely any content in it, the tutorial is basically a short video that barely explains essentials, like HOW SURVIVORS CAN ESCAPE FROM THE HOOKS!!!. I hook this one guy go off to deal with another and he's just hopped off.

Also survivors move at the same speed when injured to normal, humans are all the same and there is always an infinate juker, these are players that can jump over a piece of enviroment and you can't hit them and by the time you get across they've already gone ready and ready to go again which ruins the game.

This game has potential and sure it will become better over the coming weeks/months but I can already tell this one is for the bargain bin and it's player count is gunna take a hit, I've already refunded it myself.
It's got alot to work on if it wants my hard earned money.

But honestly if you like the idea I recommend it and suggest atleast giving it a try.
Çok güzel bi oyun çok zevkli eğer arkadasınla oynuyorsan daha da zevkli olur kesinlikle alın :) bu arada beraber oynamak isteyen ekleyebilir :)

游戏整体的可玩性还是很高的，尽管游戏模式比较单一，但是玩家可以靠自己的想法去发掘新的玩法。游戏内的类似于天梯的等级制度和评分系统，感觉也给游戏添加了一份紧张感，游戏中鬼接近的心跳声，以及音乐都做得不错，加强了这个恐怖游戏的恐怖氛围。但是游戏也还存在着很多的不足：1游戏到现在依然存在着很多bug，鬼抱起人类后动不了，幸存者不能翻越窗户等等等等。2游戏的评分还有待完善，游戏里被挂钩子上以后，被其他幸存者救下来以后的助友分数感觉太低了，导致很多玩家被挂了，然而没有人去救 ，而是选择去开发电机。3游戏内的物品手电筒，虽然可以使鬼致盲，但是并不好用，这个物品玩到现在都很少有人用4希望官方可以尽快的汉化。总体来说，游戏值得一入，无论是一个人匹配，还是和自己的好友一起玩，都非常有意思

EDIT: 30-07-'18:
In regards to the issues of the devs, nothing has changed.
The game changed, for the worse.
These devs are simply too incompetent and arrogant to admit mistakes. They certainly don't know how to deal with them, or how to solve problems.
Every single update they brought out, further reduced the balance of individual elements as well as the game as a whole.
Even now, the game is a terrible mess where the killer has significant advantages and the survivors only have a tiny chance of surviving.
The chase part is not balanced, the map gen is still not fixed, progression is still whack.
The Huntress was an abomination of design. The entire game was built around killers who had melee range. In comes a killer with a RANGED attack. If you're in a chase against the huntress, you -cannot- win/evade it/her unless you play on a single specific map and get lucky. Now there's TWO ranged killers.

EDIT 08-08-'16:
The devs still persist on lopsided fixes, only creating more problems instead of solving them. They're also officially responded to specific questions about overall or specific balance on which they did not give favourable replies.
Some people intentionally change their download region, on which the matchmaking is still dependant at the time of writing, so they will lag a lot as a killer(and thus, host) for an easy gain in points. The devs cannot do anything against this, for there is no way to prove it.
With how the game is now; as soon as you're spotted by the killer, you have only a slim chance of breaking that chase and surviving. The maps are too open, the perks are too unbalanced, the game tailors too much to cheesy, exploitative attitudes and of course, the community has turned really toxic.
/EDIT

EDIT 10-07-'16:
With how the ranking system worked from launch onward until at least the time of writing this edit, I haven't gotten above rank 10 myself so that I get into games with more competent people.
My early review below reflects the lower half of matchmaking.
/EDIT

You'd think since it is 4vs1, it'd be a team game.
You'd think it is a game that is balanced around teamwork.
Unfortunately, the game frustrated to no end, because it is exactly what the devs wanted:
The game is all about egocentric playing and making the most out of every situation for your own good. There's nothing wrong with that, it's just not what a lot of people expected at launch. A lot of players still don't seem to understand the basis; in the end, it's all about your survival, not making sure everyone gets out. Helping others is an extra optional challenge.

Examples: If a teammate is captured and put on the time-out hook, killers that camp that hook are not punished.
Yet as a survivor the reward for saving someone off the hook is minimal, butt the risk tremendously large.
It is made worse by that if the killer quickly returns to the scene, he now has two targets. But who do you think is the more likely to get chased? The fresh survivor who unhooked the other fellow, or the one that was just rescued and is wounded, loud, slow and leaves a blood trail behind him?
Idiots, newbies, assholes and the better players know this and will abuse it to no end. They will make you suffer for just a handful of extra points and/or their own survival.
Because they know that all they have to do is run faster than you, and they can get away safely with those extra points for rescuing you, whilst you go right back onto the hook.

This is just one example, but the entire game is in disbalance like that. Any points reward are instantanious, whilst any situation isn't.
After coming off the hook, you still need to escape the area and avoid the killer until you get healed up. By someone else, or the use of an item you need to equip. But the points system doesn't give you anything for losing the killer in a chase and hiding.

As up to patch 1.0.2 and its hotfixes, all the devs have done to remedy any known issues is nerfing it on one side only, creating a lopsided experience.
Survivors endlessly abusing window vaulting on certain spots on the map was a problem for killers. Aside from the number of people willfully exploiting it, it was used because survivors often do not have the right perks or options on the map to get out to safety [i]without[/i] using such a cheesy tactic.
But instead of [i]adding[/i] more balanced options for survivors for that scenario, the devs 'fixed' it by nerfing the window cheesing. Creating more inbalance towards the killer, whilst the actual problem still persists.
I find that nerfing mechanics is the wrong way to deal with balance issues.

I'll most likely keep playing it now and then, because the 2016 summer sale was disappointing and what else am I gonna do?

Это скорее не рецензия, а мои впечатления: 
Поиграл немного и могу сказать что игра не очень, по крайней мере на данный момент.
За жертв требуются слаженные командные действия, иначе быстро становится скучно играть, т.е. очень желательно играть с друзьями с голосовой связью - в этом случае думаю будет достаточно весело, но на сколько времени вам её хватит - это вопрос. 
Хотя одному за маньяка вполне можно побегать, но желающих быть маньяком очень много, так что ждать в лобби в очереди на роль маньяка Вам прийдётся долго.
Геймплей показался слишком уж однообразным и повторяющимся. 
В общем, игра очень быстро надоела.

DBD is a really funnny game, specialy when played together with friends. There are some bugs/problems though, primarily with the matchmaking/lobbies. Sometimes you have to wait a long time before you even get to a lobby and even when you do there is a great chance that you get kicked out from the lobby for no reason. This bug is known by the devs. and they are currently working on it though. I rate this game an 8/10 because even if there still are some bugs in the game it is very amusing to play. 10/10 when the matchmaking is working.

Okay... so this game is very fun when i played with friends in a private lobby as we could communicate and work very well together, we could help each other out and generally survive longer and often win. But online is a different story, with no team chat or text chat there is no way of communicating, its every man for himself, no one even bothers to assist people near death or assist with generators.
The only way this game is fun is with a full private lobby of friends.
DON'T BUY THIS GAME UNLESS YOU HAVE 4 OTHER FRIENDS THAT OWN IT

YELP review for The Macmillan Estate - The Gateway To A Better Life

Was hired to be a night groundskeeper at the Macmillan Estate fixing the generators during the "Run Or Dye" event happening -- I hear the money and meats raised go toward local charities!
Perks:
*Get to live on the land!
*Free & fresh food -- been told the it's to die for
*Gym instructor, nicknamed The Trapper, gives a real killer workout
*Guests at the estate are happy to help with fixing the generators at night

I can't even begin to say the warmth you feel when you enter the estates, and are greated with a nice, warm smile from the greeter that comes over the PA, kindly saying "Nice to meat you!"

8/10 have already recommended my friends to stay at The Macmillan Estate!

*seriously tho, this game would be a heck of a lot better if you could party up with one or two friends & find others to play the game with. All I see is Private Match for an option, and I only have two other friends who play the game at this time.

Que dire de ce jeux à par qu'il est énorme et qu'il mais une immersion génial deplus il est pas facile ! Il rencontre des bug de collision est n'est pas forcément bien optimiser mais les Devlopeures taff dessu, il faut qu'en même ce dire que les jeux viens de sortir. 

Dans les Mis à Jour futur je suppose qu'il y aura de plus en plus de contenu, nouveaux survivant, nouveaux tueur, nouvelle map ainsi que tout ce qui est item consommable, point de compétence etc etc... 
Pour ma par je suis pas déçu de l'avoir acheter ☺️.
À oui ! Un système de classes(survivant & tueur) est mis en place par exemple l'un des survivant est plus fort pour être silencieux d'autre donne des bonus si il et avec d'autre survivant et c'est pareille pour les 3 types de tueur à savoir : Le Pillgeur, Le Spectre et Le Montagnard. 

Le Pillgeur pourra poser des piégs à Ours et serra plus fort pour casser les décors qui seront là pour vous ralentir.

Le Spectre lui peu ce rendre invisible et ainsi pourra traquer les malins qui croiront pouvoir vous dupé.

Pour finir Le Montagniard équiper de sont joujou préférait j'ai nommée, la Tronsoneuse vous chassera et si vous n'est pas assez vigilent il vous sautera dessus pour vous couper un boue et vous mettre à Terre gare à vous ! 


Sur ce bon jeu à tous :) ❤️

This is a good game. I admit it. Full of potential, yup.
But with good conscience of mine, I can't possibly recommend this game to anyone, at least for now. For a multiplayer online game, you need to guarantee stable connectivity. That's the least thing you should do. 

Trying to join the lobby and find your teammates can't be more frustrating.

I like this game so I'll keep playing, but as long as I experience this critical issue, I will keep this negative review.

Decently fun, but seems unfinished. Fairly limited in terms of game types and monsters. After playing it for a bit I was certain it was early access and they had just not yet added everything. I wish I could give a neutral review as it it fun for what it is, I just fear that there will be a loads more dlc to come to make up for the limited game types, maps and monsters. [h1] Review zu Dead by Daylight	[/h1]

Ich habe mir das Spiel im Summer Sale gekauft, obwohl ich eigentlich kein Freund von Horror-Games bin, doch die vielen Streams und Videos auf YouTube haben mich dann doch neugierig gemacht.
Es ist ein Horror Spiel (4 vs 1) indem 4 Survivor gegen 1 Killer bestehen müssen. Dabei geht es darum, dass die Survivor Generatoren reparieren müssen um die Ausgänge mit Strom zu versorgen und damit vor dem Killer flüchten können. Der Killer muss die Survivor aufspüren, jagen und töten. Letzteres kann er jedoch nicht selbst tun sondern muss die Survivor an einem Haken aufhängen. Die Survivor können versuchen sich selbst vom Haken zu befreien oder aber den Tod so lange herauszögern um von einem anderen gerettet zu werden. Hierbei ist zu beachten, dass es für Hilfe und Team Aktionen weit mehr Punkte gibt als wenn man stur alleine Generatoren repariert.
Außer den Ausgängen gibt es auch noch die Möglichkeit eine Falltüre auf der Map zu finden um durch sie zu flüchten. Die Falltüre öffnet sich durch 2 Dinge:
1. Man ist der letzte Survivor weil alle anderen bereits Tod sind oder geflohen sind
2. Es gibt einen Schlüssel den man über das Blutnetz bekommen kann
Das Blutnetz stellt eine Art Skilltree dar, wo man allerdings alles Skillen muss um im Level aufzusteigen und ein neuen Blutnetz zu bekommen. 
Es gibt aktuell 4 verschiedene Survivor und 3 verschiedene Killer wo jeder seine eigenen, ganz speziellen Perks freischalten kann. Aktuelle Maximalstufe liegt bei Lvl 50, danach kann man sich Prestige Level freischalten.
Außerdem gibt es auch ein Rang System dass von 20 abwärts verläuft.

[h1] PRO´s	[/h1]
[list]
    [*]eine komplett neue Art von Spiel
    [*]Nervenkitzel pur
    [*]sehr spaßig mit Freunden zusammen
    [*]schaurige Atmosphäre
    [*]das Spiel ist auf Teamplay ausgelegt, alleine erhält man kaum Punkte
[/list]
[h1] CONTRA´s	[/h1]
[list]
    [*][strike]aktuell keine *offizielle* Möglichkeit mit Freunden gemeinsam ein Öffentliches Spiel zu betreten[/strike]
    [*]noch häufige Abstürze
    [*]einige Bugs im Spiel aber auch in der Lobby zB Blutnetz leere Felder wo man nicht weiter skillen kann und daher kein     lvl up
    [*]wenig Abwechslung weil immer der selbe Ablauf
    [*]Camper verderben den Spielspaß und geben einem nicht die Möglichkeit zu fliehen/retten etc
    [*]Entwickler verwerfen ihr eigenes Konzept leider viel zu schnell und geben bei allen Kleinigkeiten der Community klein bei. Kann man positiv oder negativ sehen. Für mich ist das eher negativ.
[/list]

[b] Anmerkung: Meine lieben Killer alias Dauercamper, hört bitte auf Leute am Haken dauerhaft zu campen. Das vermiest jedem das Spiel und bringt euch auch fast nichts. Ihr bekommt die meisten Punkte durchs Leute finden, jagen etc aber nicht beim rumstehen und den Leuten beim sterben zusehen. 
Genauso die Leute die nur alleine rumlaufen und niemandem helfen. Generatoren sind wichtig ja, ABER es ist ein Teamspiel und wenn alle zusammen spielen hat es der Killer ultra schwer. Ich erlebe es immer wieder, dass ich jemandem helfe, dann selbst am Haken hänge, 10 m. neben mir repariert jemand einen Generator, der Killer weit weg und der lässt mich verrecken! Leute ernsthaft mal.... was bringt euch das? Umso mehr Leute tod sind umso unwahrscheinlicher wird es das ihr selbst überlebt. Außerdem bekommt man VIEL mehr Punkte wenn man Leute vom Haken holt oder verarztet!
Ihr braucht euch nicht Harakiri mäßig auf den Killer stürzen aber versucht wenigstens etwas mehr Teamplay zu zeigen[/b]

Ansonsten ist dieses Spiel echt gut gelungen und es sollen zukünftig wohl noch mehr Maps und Charaktere kommen worüber ich mich sehr freuen würde.[strike] Außerdem soll eine Option kommen um doch noch mit Freunden für Punkte spielen zu können.[/strike]	

Von mir ein 7/10 (- [strike]Freunde Spiel Option[/strike], - Abwechslung, -Bugs, - verworfenes Konzept)
很不错的一款游戏带给了我从所未有的紧张感希望早日出汉化

In my opinion, game now is probably in the best state since the release in terms of gameplay, ofc it still has a lot of issues which I will discuss later. First of all, I wanted to say that the game is still consistently have updates and new content, in my experience I have a very few bugs in my matches, performance is fine on my mediocre PC in comparison with very good hardware on the market at 2021 November( mine is i5 10400, rtx2060s, ssd, win 10, 24 gb ram). 

So what's with the issues and other stuff. 
1) Balance. Though game itself is probably in the most balanced state now in comparison with 2016 meta of 5bnps(brand new parts) and sabo gods, and later in 2017-2018 Nurses and Billies and on swf side keys and other stuff. Though the game still is a pretty survivor sided, especially for SWF(survive with friends) groups.
2) MMR. new matchmaking system works very strange, sometimes as one killer you can be matched with low level survivors, and if you switch to the killer you mostly never play you can be matched with 5k hrs groups which is impossible to win. Solo survivor games as well are pretty much disbalance roulette where you don't know what people you will play with and killers are pretty much amazing every game. 
3) Perks, Mostly a lot of perks are still useless, but now more and more people running different builds and perks which is great in my opinion. 
4) Dead hard is still broken.
5) Anti-cheat and report system is still very bad. Though there aren't many blatant cheaters, but there are quite many players who hack inventory and add-ons or items + legacy. And report system works very poorly.
6) Maps are mostly broken as well in terms of balance, mostly survivor sided but sometimes game generates big open zones on maps without pallets at all.

Overall I can recommend the game, but it's still very frustrating to play sometimes.
GOOD

Ein tolles Grundkonzept, welches viel Spaß verspricht. Leider ist es zum aktuellen Zeitpunkt an zu vielen Stellen weder optimiert noch gut durchdacht. Die Performance lässt oftmals zu wünschen übrig, es gibt unzählige Bugs, mögliche Glitches und viel zu unausgeglichenen Spielinhalt. An letzterem mangelt es derzeit übrigens bereits nach kurzer Zeit, auch wenn die Entwickler bereits neuen versprachen. 
Für mich ähnelt das Spiel derzeit eher einer gerade erst begonnenen Early-Access-Phase. Wer damit kein Problem hat, wird zwar viele Stunden mit dem Spiel verbringen können, jedoch oft an den (vielen) Grenzen des Spiels sauer aufstoßen.

Ich würde Interessenten zu einem späteren Kauf raten und wünschte, ich hätte dies auch getan.

What can i say. The game brings lots and lots of fun to me everyday , with every match being different and having to adapt a different strategy to survive. Sometimes you have to let others die, sometimes you really want to save them before it´s too late.
As well as an horror experience, the game lets you chill by Playing as the killer himself , so you can "relax" a bit while still playing the game and understand how a killer thinks and act

Sadly the community kinda sucks, people complain every day of that and that and that, asking the developers to "keep the game updated", even though they are releasing 1 patch every 2 weeks by listening to the feedback of the community, as well as trying their best to bring new content to life. 
Play with friends in competitive play is still not possible , but by joining the steam group you can play private games with other members of the group and your friend/s so it´s not a big deal!

Loving the game right now, hope you can love it too :D!

28/11/2020. Still playing this and i have to update this in order to get my Steam points :D
Fucking Game, are your parent dead? fuck you developer. fuck your mother. olo

Still cant team up with my friends after 3 weeks release.   C'mon what kind of company release a multiplayer like this? I cant believe this.

Beware if u play with friends.

Overall 6.5/10 ,   8/10 if they fix the team up function.

Игра хорошая, мне понравилась, затягивает на много часов из - за разнообразного геймплея и способов прокачки. Только вот в ней много багов и недоработок. Например: бывает такое, что меня из лежачего положения не может поднять маньяк, мои союзники так же не могут меня вылечить. Было такое, что союзники проваливались под карту, им оставалось только выходить из игры. Игр в таком жанре я не замечал, только Friday 13, которая выйдет в этом году и вряд ли будет такой интересной. Хотелось бы чтобы в игру добавили русский язык и возможность играть в ранкед с друзьями. DbD доставляет много удовольствия, рекомендую всем, над ней работают и скоро игра будет намного лучше!В игре есть маньяк и до 4 жертв. Есть три вида маньяка:Трапер(ставит ловушки), Билли(Ходит с бензопилой вместо одной руки), Анти - Натурал(Может становиться невидимым). И 4 вида жертв:Быстрая чувиха, чувак, который играет только в тиме, черная одиночка и Киркоров. У каждого маньяка есть уникальные перки, как и у жертв.Вам будет доступен неповторимый способ прокачки, генерируемый рандомно. Цель игры за маньяка: Постараться не дать жертвам сбежать и принести их в жерту(повесить на крюк). Цель игры за жертву: Завести генераторы и открыть дверь\найти люк. Геймплей очень разнообразен - с каждым маньяком нужно будет чудить что - то особенное, так - же за маньяка - не каждая жертва будет простафилей со двора. В общем - всего я описать не смогу, нужно постигать самому...Удачи в ваших злоключениях!

This game is quite fun.

[b] As a Survivor[/b] you run around fix machines and juke the killer like a mad man which is quite fun. It seems creepy when you play it for the first time but with each round it gets more fun.

[b] As the Killer[/b] you look for Survivors and take them down with your sword and then you hang them on the hook and watch so other Survivors don't save him. In the end some mythical creature kills the Survivor and takes him into the abyss i guess.

I would [b] love[/b] if the Developers added voice chat into this game. One room for the Survivors to talk and a second room for the Survivors to talk to the killer.

[b] I would rate this game 9/10![/b]

UPDATE: 28.3.2017

[b] The devs are pretty much ruining the game more and more. They only work on new characters but not on the game itself. Matchmaking for friends still takes hours and never works in the end. Currently I do not recommend the game.[/b]

[b] I would rate this game 3/10![/b]
10Лобби/10Лобби
Not bad
Nice

The most exciting and original game I have played in years. Switching between survivor and killer is like switching to a different game: As survivor, you're on the edge of your seat trying to focus on fixing generators while looking out for the killer. As Killer, you're on the edge of your seat looking for survivors as your last prey is struggling on a hook while someone might be saving them. Both sides are exciting in exactly the same way for completely different reasons, all in the one game.  And that's just the gameplay! If grisly killers scare you, this might just be the ultimate replayable horror game for you.

Echt gutes Spiel vorallem mit 4 Freunden

This game shines the strongest the first time you play it. It's intense, I literally quit the match because of how stressed I was at being last alive and hadn't even found my way to a generator yet. (this was week 2 after release in 2016 mind.) 

Nowadays a lot of bugs have been fixed but one thing that never will change is the attitude of the killer. To have a fun respectable game between the killers and survivors the killer must leave their victims to give other survivors a fair chance to save them. and a hell of a lot of players just camp their bodies abusing the fact that they know others will be coming to save them, expecting the Killer to play fair.

Having said that the game is very addictive, high pressure and exciting when you manage to outplay the killer or sneak right by.
Оптимизации нет, баги не фиксят, но играть весело
Even though I should put a survivor on the nearest hook so they don't wiggle away I like putting them in the basement because I like the basement.
i like this game :D
